alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Jackson and central Madison Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 801 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Harvest, or 7 miles southwest of Meridianville. Another strong thunderstorm was located about 7 miles west of Gurley. These storms were moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Redstone Arsenal, Owens Cross Roads, Gurley, Alabama A And M University, University Of Alabama In Huntsville and Harvest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central and northeastern Alabama.
